import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../../assets/img/pizza-logo.svg' import Search from '../Search/Search' import { selectorCart } from '../../redux/slices/cartSlice' import useWhyDidYouUpdate from 'ahooks/lib/useWhyDidYouUpdate'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useGetPizzas } from '../../Hook/useGetPizzas' const Header: React.FC = React.memo(() => { const getPizza = useGetPizzas const { totalPrice, totalCount } = useSelector(selectorCart) useWhyDidYouUpdate('Header', { totalPrice, totalCount }) return (
getPizza()} to='/'>

React Pizza

самая вкусная пицца во вселенной

) }) export default Header
